entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 8:15 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
